product_name: Pacsafe Venturesafe 300 GII Vertical Travel Bag
long_description: Get off the beaten track with the Pacsafe Venturesafe 300 GII Vertical travel bag. You'll explore easier knowing your valuable gear is well protected from pickpockets and bag snatchers. Zippered main compartment has a padded sleeve that holds and protects an iPad, tablet or a 13 in. laptop. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into vulnerable areas to prevent thieves from slashing through the fabric. Exterior zip pocket includes an RFID-reader-blocking pocket which prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Exterior zippers fasten to concealed clips, making it hard for pickpockets to unzip and snatch your valuables. Dual-release security buckle allows you to secure the bag around a chair or other fixture to prevent pack snatching when dining or relaxing. Pacsafe Venturesafe 300 GII Vertical travel bag also features 2 side, stretch water bottle/umbrella pockets, a key clip and top carry handle. Light-colored printed lining makes it easier to identify contents.
short_description: Get off the beaten track with the Pacsafe Venturesafe 300 GII Vertical travel bag. You'll explore easier knowing your valuable gear is well protected from pickpockets and bag snatchers.
